contentList.content: Your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You may spend a <LSTag Tooltip="Bonus_Action">bonus action</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag> to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hide</LSTag>.

Camouflage and hiding is your speciality. You may spend a <LSTag Tooltip="Bonus_Action">bonus action</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag> to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hide</LSTag>.

You've mastered the arts of stealth and subterfuge. You may spend a <LSTag Tooltip="Bonus_Action">bonus action</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag> to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hide</LSTag>.
